title: VB's generated target framework moniker attributes missing auto-generated comment
body:
https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/blob/d42d3504057ef2b88dd4f68c4bfc5591371bd6fe/src/Tasks/Microsoft.VisualBasic.CurrentVersion.targets#L333-L345

This generated text should start with the following to match the C# generated file:

```
' <autogenerated />
```
